revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=HIMS |model=Braille Sense U2 Mini |revision=(H418B) |asin=B00D6KGP6E |fcc_date=10/29/2013 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=braille notetaker, human disability mitigation device, |fcc_id=QJCH418B |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 3110 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=512 MiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=256 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG), SD Card, microSD, |expansion_sdcard_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8712 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |flags=GPS, Bluetooth 2.0+EDR |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=Bluetooth module;Hana Micron;HBH2X3M;HBH2X3M, C4R328F, 053BF;1; |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= }} {{TagLine|Braille Notetaker}} :[http://www.himsintl.com/product04/ Product page]
"H418B_V2.0" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos. :The USB WiFi IC is marked '''RTL8712''', '''C4D72A2 GC15'''. :There is an internal microSD card for additional storage.
Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... *CPU: ''Mobile CPU'' @800MHz *Flash: 32 GB, RAM: 256 MB *OS: '''Windows''' CE 6.0 *Battery: Li-Ion, detatchable *Sensor: 6-axis motion sensor *GPS: Internal receiver *Sound: Internal stereo speakers, stereo microphone jack *Vibration motor: installed
The power supply shown in the FCC docs is a '''DVE''' DSA-12CA-05 060200 :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 5VDC, 2A) w/ Euro plug.
===See also=== *'''HIMS USB LCD Display for Braille Notetaker''' • [https://www.amazon.com/USB-LCD-Display-Braille-Notetaker/dp/B00D6KGP6E/ B00D6KGP6E] :Manufacture: HIMS, Model: 200673; compatible: *'''HIMS Braille Sense OnHand''' - Model: H318B *'''HIMS Braille Sense U2''' - Model: H432B • [http://www.himsintl.com/product02/ PPage] *'''HIMS Braille Sense U2 Mini''' - Model: H418B • [http://www.himsintl.com/product04/ PPage] *'''HIMS Braille Sense U2 Qwerty''' - Model: H432Q • [http://www.himsintl.com/product03/ PPage]
